description: TradeMetrics Pro delivers premium Expert Advisor modification and enhancement services to the prestigious Cantonments district, home to embassies and diplomatic missions. Located 4km from Accra's CBD, Cantonments is known for its upscale residences and international business community. Our experienced MQL4/MQL5 developers specialize in upgrading existing EAs with sophisticated features, fixing bugs, optimizing performance, and modernizing legacy code to meet the exacting standards of Cantonments' professional traders. Whether you need improved risk management, trailing stops, time filters, dashboard displays, or complete code refactoring, we provide expert solutions. We serve diplomats, expat traders, and local professionals in Cantonments who demand reliability and excellence. Our modification services include adding custom indicators, implementing multi-timeframe confirmations, fixing compilation errors, converting MT4 EAs to MT5, and adding remote monitoring. From simple enhancements to comprehensive rebuilds, we maintain your EA's profitable core while dramatically improving functionality and performance. Professional service matching Cantonments' premium standards.

faq.question: Can you modify EAs without source code?
faq.answer: Yes, we can decompile .ex4 files in most cases. Contact us for assessment.

faq.question: How much does EA modification cost?
faq.answer: Simple: $100-200. Medium: $200-400. Complex: $500-800. Fixed-price quotes after analysis.

faq.question: How long does modification take?
faq.answer: Simple: 1-3 days. Medium: 5-7 days. Complex: 1-3 weeks.

faq.question: Will existing features still work?
faq.answer: Yes! We maintain backward compatibility and test thoroughly.

faq.question: Can you upgrade MT4 EA to MT5?
faq.answer: Absolutely! MT4 to MT5 migration is a core service.

faq.question: What support after delivery?
faq.answer: 14 days of premium support including fixes, adjustments, and technical help.

faq.question: Can you optimize performance?
faq.answer: Yes! We specialize in optimization: 30-50% improvements common.

faq.question: How to get started?
faq.answer: Contact us via phone, WhatsApp, or email. Free analysis within 24 hours.
